pr_title: [plugin-browserstack] Add link to public browserstack report

timeline.author: valfirst

replies.bodyText: to avoid multiple links received from GivenStories scenarios at Scenario level
replies.author: uarlouski

timeline.author: valfirst

replies.bodyText: there is no much variety, either issue or tms, we can consider introducing new icon for links in the future
replies.author: uarlouski

replies.bodyText: you can use any link type, the difference is that custom link types won't have icons
replies.author: valfirst

replies.bodyText: yes, but this will look like plain txt, that's why I excluded this from the choice
replies.author: uarlouski

replies.bodyText: TMS - Test management system, not every link points to TMS, so the event should have ability to provide link type, it won't have any icon, but that's better than misleading icon
replies.author: valfirst

timeline.bodyText: I believe you can have a sinlge class for all BS steps (only 2)
timeline.author: valfirst

replies.bodyText:
it's more clear when we separate steps used by users and not by users
some users may dig into implementation, such steps can bring additional noise
replies.author: uarlouski

replies.bodyText: if users are skilled enough to read java code, then there should be no problem to have any other methods in the class
replies.author: valfirst

replies.bodyText: what is advantage of putting two completely different sets of functionality into one class?
replies.author: uarlouski
